item.description:
In the interest of mixing things up, our next Trivia Stop is at Abe's on Wickenden Street.

The bar is a revamped version of an earlier dive bar and has a great selection of beer and drinks. Even better, the full menu from nearby United BBQ is available at a 20 percent discount. Come on down. It should be a fun time.

Saying you aren't any good at trivia is no excuse not to come out. Do you watch TV? Movies? Listen to Music? Eat? Know a little history? Geography?

Everyone knows something about the world and can make a great contribution to the game as well as to the conversations around the tables while we play. Come on out, socialize with the easiest group of people you'll ever make friends with!

The game starts around 8 and should run for about 2 hours.

Hope to see you there!
item.how_to_find_us: I will be there with a Meetup sign
item.name: Trivia @ Abes on Wickenden Street
